en-US: For security reasons, we're no longer publishing our PayPal, WeChat, and Alipay links. If you are in the Mainland China region, please try using Afdian, Buy me a coffee, or join our QQ group and send 'red packets' to the group owner.
zh-CN: 出于安全原因，我们不再公开我们的 PayPal、微信和支付宝链接或二维码。如果您在中国大陆地区，强烈建议使用爱发电。如果不行，则请尝试 Buy me a coffee，或者加入我们的 QQ 群并向群主发送红包。
